description: This file is an HTML source for a web-based database viewer application. It includes structure, styles, and client-side JavaScript for interacting with a backend API to fetch database, table, and data information, rendering a user interface for browsing relational data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list on user request.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing database entries to display tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a specific table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data into an HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content with formatting and expandability.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
